before_sale_price_font_size_tablet=”20px” before_sale_price_font_size_phone=”16px” before_sale_price_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” sale_price_font_size_tablet=”26px” sale_price_font_size_phone=”20px” sale_price_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_module=”6203″ saved_tabs=”all”][/et_pb_wc_price][et_pb_text content_phone=”

Your Intelligent Companion robot is here, ready to befriend, entertain, teach, and communicate in a wide variety of scenarios. Alpha Mini is highly portable, bringing fun interactions and a wealth of expressions and functionality, including voice interaction, 4G LTE connectivity, face recognition, illustrated book recognition, and object recognition.

” content_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size=”20px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” header_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_margin_phone=”0px|30px|-9px|30px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_padding=”||||true|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

In this course, students will start from the typical application of AI, understand the development and principle of AI technology, contact the specific application of AI technology in society and real life, and think about how AI can help people improve work efficiency and quality of life; through the application of AI, students would be able to prospect the future development of the society. It would broaden students’ thinking and vision, stimulate students’ interest in exploring the subject of artificial intelligence, and establish a correct view of science and technology application.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_wc_add_to_cart disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ fields_background_color=”#0C71C3″ fields_focus_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” fields_custom_margin=”||||false|false” fields_custom_padding=”||||false|false” dropdown_menus_background_color=”#000000″ body_font=”|600|||||||” fields_text_align=”center” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”12px” button_icon=”%%198%%” custom_margin=”||||false|false” fields_font_size_tablet=”” fields_font_size_phone=”16px” fields_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_radii_fields=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_style_all_fields=”solid” global_module=”6200″ saved_tabs=”all”][/et_pb_wc_add_to_cart][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
